text:
The httpd-2.2.3/docs/manual/howto/ssi.html.en documentation 
advises the use of the directive: 
 
     Options +Includes 
 
The + is incorrect, stops the directive from having the  
intended effect and should not be present.
creator: tom.lake@glossa.co.uk
rbowen@apache.org
text:
The + causes it to be added to existing Options that are already in effect.
Removing the + would have the effect of disabling any other Options that were in
effect, which is not desired in most cases.

I respectfully disagree with your assessment, unless you can provide additional
reasons to support your claim.

Marking bug as NEEDINFO.

creator: tom.lake@glossa.co.uk
